name: CARGO AIRTIME
description:
Flip, Twist and Bounce your way through space. Wrack up points by bouncing the cargo on the wing of your ship. Maneuver between skyscrapers and billboards all the while keeping sight of that cargo. controls:

A/D - Turning

W/S - Elevation

K/L - Tilt
(controller compatible - XBOX/PS4)

credits: Coding - PBeGood4 [YT] , Roanock, Banthanor Art - Ryanimateon, Robin E, s.lynch1607 Music & Sound - Max Nattrass Game Tester - Imapigtoo
